test.name: Check rowguid column in Person.Address table for correct length

kw.name: Connect
kw.doc: Constructor for creating a connection to the database. Returns a Connection object.
kw.msg: OperationalError: (20009, b'DB-Lib error message 20009, severity 9:\nUnable to connect: Adaptive Server is unavailable or does not exist (server=localhost)\n')

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Query
kw.doc: Uses the input `selectStatement` to query for the values that will be returned as a list of tuples. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback. Set optional input `returnAsDict` to True to return values as a list of dictionaries.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.arg: msg=Rowguid ${rowguid} has length ${length}, which is not 36.
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

test.status: OperationalError: (20009, b'DB-Lib error message 20009, severity 9:\nUnable to connect: Adaptive Server is unavailable or does not exist (server=localhost)\n')
